title: Jungle Deep by Sergei Sarichev
author: Sergei Sarichev
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Jungle Deep by Sergei Sarichev
text:
Cover Art
 Jungle Deep
 Sergei Sarichev is a freelance concept artist and illustrator focused on film, video games and cover art. He began his career by studying traditional painting on his own and a few years ago he progressed into CGI painting and design, constantly learning new techniques to tell his stories.
